description: Jacked, tattooed stud Theo Ross is a workaholic who is not taking his company mandated time off seriously, but mustached, black-haired hunk Teddy Torres is dead set on making sure Theo gets some much needed rest. It becomes clear to Teddy that the only way he's going to get Theo to stop thinking about work is by giving him something better to think about, slowly and sensually sucking Theo's thick cock then taking it deep inside his perfectly hairy ass.
title: Work Life Balance
